channel.title: Chell's new outfit
channel.description:
[url='https://www.canardpc.com/img/couv/couv_Canard_PC_227.jpg']https://www.canardpc.com/img/couv/couv_Canard_PC_227.jpg[/url]
Portal 2's protagonist, Chell, has a new outfit. Look's great, IMO. The unzipped jumpsuit is a nice subtle change, and the sports-onesie thing and Aperture-brand tank top give her an Ellen Ripley-ish quality. And, god be praised, they kept her ponytail ^_^
What do you guys think?
Also, they overhauled the Portal 2 site. Similarly awesome. [url='https://www.thinkwithportals.com/']https://www.thinkwithportals.com/[/url]

item.title: Chell's new outfit
item.dc:creator: Ramirezoid
item.description:
doomyshadowsquirrels:

Nerd can debunk oAo her sleeves only fold up once, and have a button to keep them up.

I own several dozen long sleeved shirts with those sleeve-holder buttons, you can roll the sleeves up like 3 times and get a short-sleeved silhouette like Chell has.

Nobody is going to make a shirt with sleeves that go to the elbow and stop just so you can roll them up once. That’d be fucking dumb.

Read full topic

item.title: Chell's new outfit
item.dc:creator: Dias
item.description:
https://www.kotaku.com/5767246/the-new-look-for-portal-2s-heroine-explained:

Portal 2 takes place well after the events of the original game, but for Chell (and likewise the player) all that time has passed in an instant. She’s also evolved from a lab rat under the facility’s control to the sole cause of its destruction. Her familiar dehumanizing orange jumpsuit is still present, but she’s tied the top around her waist and rolled up her sleeves to give her more freedom this time around. This also helps her stand out more as an individual, as opposed to a numbered, anonymous test subject.

Same suit brah. B) deal with it.

Read full topic

item.title: Chell's new outfit
item.dc:creator: doomyshadowsquirrels
item.description:
Deathmonkey7:

Wrong. Her sleeves were rolled up.

Nerd can debunk oAo her sleeves only fold up once, and have a button to keep them up.

I’ve spent A LOT of time studying Chell’s outfit. Memorizing it was the only way I can now draw it so frequently without a reference :jizz:

Read full topic

item.title: Chell's new outfit
item.dc:creator: Dias
item.description:
doomyshadowsquirrels:

The Portal 1 suit had shorter sleeves, (not long enough to tie a knot) and the new suit has knee-patches. And the Portal 1 suit has far fewer white stripes.

Close enough. 9_9

Fancy Pants:

yeah i didn’t notice the scout bandage

Alyx has it too. Should have been far more obvious, since they’re both on the right arm. :retard:

item.title: Chell's new outfit
item.dc:creator: doomyshadowsquirrels
item.description:
DEATH eVADER:

There are some differences between architecture (namely the elevators) that leads me to believe Portal 1 was set sometime before the Portal Storms. The Facility was then rebuilt by the company, and then the Portal Storm occured sometime after hence the overgrown and dilapidated.

Portal 1 was after the events of HL2+Eps, it’s supported by Valve, and many references GLaDOS makes to the Combine. Don’t you remember how everyone was DEAD and GLaDOS had put the whole facility on lockdown? Yeah, ‘the company’, and nobody else for that matter, is coming anywhere near Aperture Laboratories.

GLaDOS was activated ‘days before’ the RC, and she killed everyone the second she was. She saved a few employees (like the Ratman and Chell) to use as Test Subjects.

It was the blast from GLaDOS’ death (end of Portal 1) that caused the facility to fall apart, and expose itself to structural degradation (Portal 2)

Ramirezoid:

I appreciate that you’re not one of those retards that thinks race is skin deep, but her facial structure is definitely not supposed to be that anglofied.

It’s not totally anglofied either. She’s obviously lost weight, gained muscle, and redone her hair (hiding a lot of specific facial features), and the bright lighting really obscures her skin. I’m not surprised that she’s a bit harder to recognize. I’m also sure Valve will support every little decision they made with her new appearance.

Read full topic

item.title: Chell's new outfit
item.dc:creator: Ramirezoid
item.description:
doomyshadowsquirrels:

She’s paler because she’s spent a few hundred years indoors… and her skin is shinier 'cause she’s sweat-ay. Her facial features are still very mixed, IMO.

I appreciate that you’re not one of those retards that thinks race is skin deep, but her facial structure is definitely not supposed to be that anglofied.

Read full topic

item.title: Chell's new outfit

doomyshadowsquirrels:

You might be the kind of kid who rubs it out to joggers who pass by their window, huh?

Now when you say “their” windows, I’m guessing you meant “your” as in my window, or else you just are setting up a very random and awkward scene.

And if by “rubs it out”, you mean “kidnap and have forceful intercourse”, then yeah sure. Why do you ask? :terror:
